Title: standby mode
Html:
When the phone is ready for use, and you have not keyed in any characters, the phone is in standby mode. The name of the service provider/logo appears in the display.

  1. Indicates in which cellular network the phone is currently being used.
  2. Shows the signal strength of the cellular network at your current location. The bigger the bar, the stronger the signal.
  3. Shows the battery charge level. The bigger the bar, the more power in the battery.
  4. The left selection key in standby mode is Menu.
  5. The right selection key in standby mode is Contacts if no other functions are assigned to it. Otherwise the key is Go to.
  6. Shows the track title when the Music player is on or the radio channel when the Radio is on.
